org.lucee.extension.orm.hibernate

Class HibernateORMTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lucee.extension.orm.hibernate.HibernateORMTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction

    public class HibernateORMTransaction
extends Object
implements lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction
    Hibernate Transaction wrapper object. Useful for opening, closing, and general management of a single transaction.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HibernateORMTransaction(org.hibernate.Session session, boolean autoManage)
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HibernateORMTransaction

        public HibernateORMTransaction(org.hibernate.Session session,
                               boolean autoManage)
        Constructor. Does NOT open a Hibernate transaction at this time.

        To open a Hibernate transaction, call begin() after this method: 

         HibernateORMTransaction tx = new HibernateORMTransaction(session, true);
 tx.begin();
        Parameters:
        session - Hibernate session to open a transaction on
        autoManage - Should the Transaction be auto-managed

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        public void begin()
        Open or acquire a Transaction for the current session.

        Will flush the current session if autoManage is enabled.

        Specified by:
        begin in interface lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction
        See Also:
        SharedSessionContract.getTransaction()

      • commit

        public void commit()
        Commit the transaction. Just kidding... right now this method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        commit in interface lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction

      • rollback

        public void rollback()
        Mark the transaction for rollback. Will only execute a rollback on end()
        Specified by:
        rollback in interface lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction

      • end

        public void end()
        Wrap up the transaction.
        • Will roll back if rollback() called.
        • Will commit if transaction already committed. ðŸ¤¯
        • May flush the session or clear the session depending on transaction state and autoManage settings.
        • (currently) closes the session on execution. (See LDEV-4017)
        Specified by:
        end in interface lucee.runtime.orm.ORMTransaction

      • getTransaction

        public org.hibernate.Transaction getTransaction()
        Retrieve the internal Hibernate transaction
        Returns:
        a Hibernate Transaction object.
